oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Lester Flatt and the Lewis Family at the Salem Civic Center
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Flatt, Lester; Lewis Family (Bluegrass musical group);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (black and red on white) announcing Lester Flatt with the Lewis Family coming to the Salem Civic Center on March 28. Poster features metal photoplates of Lester Flatt and the Nashville Grass and the Lewis Family.
